meta: Whoever and wherever you are you may be able to join Virufy project and help create an AI driven online COVID-19 test. Make a difference today.
title: You can help control the pandemic | Virufy

joinusContibute.title: We need your contribution to be able to continue helping millions of people in the fight against covid
joinusContibute.details: We have two ways to contribute – choose the one you want, and donate now.

availableRoles.ourMission: Virufy, a nonprofit research consortium of researchers, innovators, and scientists, has united volunteers from 25+ countries to develop a smartphone app for the detection of COVID-19. Initially developed as a Stanford University COVID-19 Response Innovation Lab project, Virufy’s artificial intelligence (AI) COVID-19 diagnostic solution fights the pandemic through widespread, accessible, and free testing.
availableRoles.fontHeading: Virufy is entirely run by volunteers and pro bono partner companies. Join our fast-paced, mission-driven team to put your skills to use in curbing the spread of the pandemic globally.
availableRoles.fontheadingBold: Got what it takes? Check out opportunities below!

joinusCollaborate.joinTitle: Join us in the fight against COVID-19.
joinusCollaborate.details: Whether you're a humanitarian, an expert, or simply want to participate in Virufy's mission, there are so many ways to help out.
joinusCollaborate.textcarrers: Join our fast-paced, mission-driven team combining unique skills to curb the spread of the pandemic globally.
joinusCollaborate.textbecomeaPartner: We work with medical, technology, government, and other established organizations across the globe to shape Virufy’s mission.

joinusTellStory.head: Share Your Personal Story
joinusTellStory.details: Tell us how COVID 19 has affected you or your family and how you have been able to overcome the disease, many people will find motivation in your story.
joinusTellStory.yourStory: Your Story has been successfully recieved

opportunities.head: Virufy is entirely run by volunteers and pro bono partner companies.
opportunities.Subhead: Join our fast-paced, mission-driven team to put your skills to use in curbing the spread of the pandemic globally. Got what it takes? Check out opportunities below!
opportunities.title: Job Openings
opportunities.TextSwissArmy: Seeking an individual to contribute on a part-time volunteer basis as a Jack/Jill-of-all-trades!
opportunities.TextProductManager: Seeking an individual to contribute on a part-time volunteer basis and collaborate closely with the Virufy development team, define the product roadmap, manage development progress and align with stakeholders.

donate.title: Make a donation
donate.details:
Donate now to help Virufy perform its vital work of bringing fast and free disease detection to all.

Every bit helps — we couldn’t do it without the financial support of contributors like you.

shareCough.title: Share your cough
shareCough.details: Donate your cough in our study help refine our AI’s predictive ability to recognize COVID-19.

contribute.title: Partner with us
contribute.details: We work with medical, technology, government, and other established organizations across the globe to shape and accomplish Virufy’s mission.
contribute.question: Looking to partner?

join.title: Meet our people
join.details: Virufy works with established institutions across the globe to fulfill its mission in the areas of medical technology, government, and other areas. As a nonprofit organization in the field of technology-enabled disease identification, we aim to transform global healthcare and inspire support and investment.
